Trulia Mobile For Professionals It looks like Javascript is disabled in your browser. Trulia requires Javascript to be enabled in order to use our site. Please follow these instructions to enable Javascript. for sale resale $625,000 5 Sussex Court, Garnet Valley PA 19060 Welcome to this elegant and spacious home in “Rockford Estates”, Garnet Valley Schools, filled with lots of bells and whistles that are sure to excite. From the dramatic two story entry foyer with graceful turned staircase and windows, to the beautiful hardwood floors throughout most of the main level, to the sumptuous master suite with tray ceiling, double walk-in closets and master bath, to the nicely finished lower level with hardwood floors, theater room, full bath and recessed lighting, this home offers something for everyone. Formal living room and formal dining room with architectural moldings and oversized windows, eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, island, recessed lights, butler’s pantry with granite and wet bar, and sliders to the deck, family room with floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace, sunroom/office, laundry room and powder room, breezeway to 2 car garage. Upstairs features the master suite, 3 additional bedrooms and hall bath with double sink. The full, finished basement with bath offers many possibilities. All this on an acre lot. housing 39.878426 -75.47388 Home Facts Photos 25 Map&Nearby Mortgage Comparables Sales Trends Schools Photos of 5 Sussex Court, Garnet Valley PA View large photos (25) Watch virtual tour

From the dramatic two story entry foyer with graceful turned staircase and windows, to the beautiful hardwood floors throughout most of the main level, to the sumptuous master suite with tray ceiling, double walk-in closets and master bath, to the nicely finished lower level with hardwood floors, theater room, full bath and recessed lighting, this home offers something for everyone. Formal living room and formal dining room with architectural moldings and oversized windows, eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, island, recessed lights, butler’s pantry with granite and wet bar, and sliders to the deck, family room with floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace, sunroom/office, laundry room and powder room, breezeway to 2 car garage. Upstairs features the master suite, 3 additional bedrooms and hall bath with double sink. The full, finished basement with bath offers many possibilities. All this on an acre lot.
